Title: WriteableBitmapEx for Windows Embedded
Description: WriteableBitmapEx for Windows Embedded Compact 7 and Silverlight for Windows Embedded. Requires XAML In The Hand for managed code development.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
WriteableBitmapEx for Windows Embedded Compact 7 and Silverlight for Windows Embedded. Requires XAML In The Hand for managed code development.


See the original WriteableBitmapEx project for details. This fork contains all the functionality in the Silverlight version of that project. It also contains a modified version of the Windows Phone Performance Sample designed to support a variety of Windows Embedded devices.
